Title: Separation Anxiety
Writer: Chip Johannessen, Ted Mann, Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Charlotte Stoudt (executive story editor)
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Sebastian Koch, Miranda Otto
Plot: Carrie is thrust back into the world she left behind.
